channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fly SAS to various European destinations for as low as $340 round-trip

item.title: Aer Lingus, meet Sin City: New Dublin-to-Las Vegas route coming this fall
